# Following layout is adjusted such that every component
# start on 64K boundary, this has advantage during programming
# using vanilla OpenOCD.
#
# Component	   Address    Size    device  Name[8]
FC_COMP_BOOT2      0x0	      0x6000   0       boot2
FC_COMP_FW         0x10000    0x70000  0       mcufw
FC_COMP_FW         0x80000    0x70000  0       mcufw
FC_COMP_FTFS       0xf0000    0x30000  0       ftfs
FC_COMP_FTFS       0x120000   0x30000  0       ftfs
FC_COMP_WLAN_FW    0x150000   0x50000  0       wififw
FC_COMP_WLAN_FW    0x1a0000   0x50000  0       wififw
FC_COMP_PSM	   0x1f0000   0x4000   0       psm
